en: Users of land should not be allowed to acquire rights of indefinite duration for single payments .
baseline: 土地使用者不应被允许取得单一付款的无限期权利。

en: We have been excluded from the Commonwealth , and condemned 95 to 1 at the United Nations .
baseline: 我们被排除在英联邦之外,被联合国谴责95比1。

en: Outside of the Nationalist Party , most of the important and influential bodies of public opinion have clearly decided to talk it out .
baseline: 除了民族主义党外,公众舆论的大部分重要和有影响力的机构都明确决定对此进行辩论。

en: The South African Indian Congress , the only substantial Indian community organisation , has welcomed and endorsed the call for a National Convention .
baseline: 南非印度议会(South African Indian Congress)是唯一重要的印度社区组织,欢迎并支持召开全国大会的呼吁。

en: If the country 's leading statesmen fail to lead at this moment , then the worst is inevitable .
baseline: 如果国家领导人目前未能领导,那么最糟糕的事情是不可避免的。

en: We in South Africa , and the world outside expect an answer .
baseline: 我们在南非,外面的世界也期待着答案。

en: To date we have had no reply : Nevertheless we still hold the door open .
baseline: 到目前为止,我们还没有得到答复:尽管如此,我们仍然保持着门开。

en: We urge you strongly to speak out now .
baseline: 我们强烈敦促你现在发言。

en: It is ten days to 31 May .
Things went on well for a while , but it takes some getting used to .
baseline: 事情好转了一段时间,但需要一些习惯。
